review: Works great, replaced my WDTV no regretsBuilt in support of personal video streaming would be nice but 3rd party apps like Kodi handle this.
author: ken

review: used to use my chromecast to stream netflix, but its really not make for continuous use so it started to give me trouble. I had been looking at the fire tv stick but hadnt really needed it, so after my chromecast decided to give me lip i ordered the fire tv stick. It works perfectly, i really only use it for netflix and amazon prime video (it's 100% worth it to pay for Prime membership, trust me) but the other features are cool too. 10/10 would recommend
author: Barbara Gurgel

review: It did what I was expecting it to do.

review: good value, remote is really CHEAP compared to ROKU, I own both ROKU 3 & FIRESTICK
